name: Old Point Financial Corporation
description: Old Point Financial Corporation is the parent company of Old Point National Bank, which offers a wide range of financial services including personal and commercial banking, investment services, and mortgage lending. Founded in 1922 and headquartered in Hampton, Virginia, Old Point has a rich history of serving the local community and is committed to providing personalized financial solutions. The bank operates multiple branches throughout the Hampton Roads region, enabling it to maintain strong relationships with its customers. Old Point Financial is focused on leveraging technology to enhance customer experience while ensuring the security and integrity of banking transactions. The corporation prides itself on its strong community involvement, supporting local organizations and initiatives aimed at improving the quality of life in the region. Through a combination of traditional banking services and innovative financial products, Old Point aims to be a trusted partner for individuals and businesses seeking to achieve their financial goals. The company also emphasizes a culture of integrity, respect, and accountability in its operations, striving to build long-lasting relationships with its clients and stakeholders.
